Reviews.Title: “Not so Elite as you would expect”
Reviews.Author: captdave5
Reviews.Content: stayed 8th floor hotel windows wide hot aircon april weather outside low twenties hot housekeeping staff speak english service little breakfast ok uninteresting ive seen bs moderately clean shortage electric plugs desk 1 metre business internet onoff minutes methinks server overloaded shortage drawers unpack days stay tv foreign channels 3 days bbc menu complaining theres train line below hotel windows sounds 707 passing train passes hotels airport shuttle attaturk departure cost 90 euros 35 km trip hour thinking transportation cheap turkey ripoff hotel booked paid client ca â£100 night incl breakfast

Reviews.Title: “My First Istabul Experience”
Reviews.Author: Costasxlv
Reviews.Content: actually companys preffered hotel situated asian city close recommended planning touristic istabul european hotel decent clean personel helpful english skills limited food restaurant 10th floor mainly turkish delights visit city prefer hotel closer european highlights istabul
